	- rsrAmount == 0 (contracts/p1/StRSR.sol#393)

	- ICToken(address(erc20)).exchangeRateCurrent() (contracts/plugins/assets/CTokenFiatCollateral.sol#74)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- whenDefault = block.timestamp (contracts/plugins/assets/CTokenFiatCollateral.sol#79)
	- whenDefault = Math.min(whenDefault,block.timestamp + delayUntilDefault) (contracts/plugins/assets/CTokenFiatCollateral.sol#82-84)
	- whenDefault = NEVER (contracts/plugins/assets/CTokenFiatCollateral.sol#82-84)

description:
Reentrancy in StRSRP0.stake(uint256) (contracts/p0/StRSR.sol#105-126):
	External calls:
	- main.poke() (contracts/p0/StRSR.sol#110)
	- main.rsr().safeTransferFrom(account,address(this),rsrAmount) (contracts/p0/StRSR.sol#113)
	- notPaused() (contracts/p0/StRSR.sol#105)
		- require(bool,string)(! main.paused(),Component: system is paused) (contracts/p0/mixins/Component.sol#22)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- rsrBacking += rsrAmount (contracts/p0/StRSR.sol#123)
	- totalStaked += stakeAmount (contracts/p0/StRSR.sol#120)
markdown:

	External calls:
	- [main.poke()](contracts/p0/StRSR.sol#L110)
	- [main.rsr().safeTransferFrom(account,address(this),rsrAmount)](contracts/p0/StRSR.sol#L113)
	- [notPaused()](contracts/p0/StRSR.sol#L105)
		- [require(bool,string)(! main.paused(),Component: system is paused)](contracts/p0/mixins/Component.sol#L22)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [rsrBacking += rsrAmount](contracts/p0/StRSR.sol#L123)
	- [totalStaked += stakeAmount](contracts/p0/StRSR.sol#L120)
